name: Block Defense (bushmario)
description:
Feature:

-Over 50 upgrade cards for you to enhance your turrets!

-8 types of enemies, and there are 2 strong bosses.

-Unique upgrade mechanism!

Turrets:

-Water turret: Have high rate of fire.

-Fire turret: Have high damage.

-Poison turret: Deal damage consistently to surrounding enemies.

-Destroy turret function to get back some of your money.

This may not be a good game, but definitely worth a try!
